author: __flcl
content: <@393119312350543872> <@892053833121923094> is there a plan to add fixtures generated by Execution Spec Tests to some repo?

author: marioevz
content: Hey, at the moment we do have the generated fixtures in the releases section, they are compressed in a tarball every time we release, but do you mean like uncompressed in a separate repo?

author: __flcl
content: Yep, exactly. This turned out to be very convenient, for example we have https://github.com/ethereum/tests as a submodule and it's easy to use and update.
